docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The smog creeps menacingly through doors and windows here. It attacks throats and lungs. It sometimes invades Dublin to such a degree that night appears to fall by midday.

headline.main: Dublin Journal; Fair Is City but Foul Is Air When Smog Creeps In

docs.snippet: LEAD: The smog creeps menacingly through doors and windows here. It attacks throats and lungs. It sometimes invades Dublin to such a degree that night appears to fall by midday.

byline.original: By SHEILA RULE, Special to the New York Times
